name: Hostile Takeover (gazler)
description:
You're being attacked by your own alternate self in space. You have to reach the end of the level before you completely fade out and he takes over!

Each level gets harder with new obstacles and features! Can you beat them all before you fade away?

Controls :

1. Arrow keys to move.

2. Space bar to jump.

3. Left Alt key to activate shield (available in level 3!).

Acknowledgements:

All the art is from the following asset pack by Aiden Art:  Free Pixel Space Platform Pack.

And the amazing music is by DOS88: DOS-88 Synthwave Music Library.

Font Used : VCR OSD Mono
